name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Welcome to our show in San Diego for Comic-Con week. Comic-Con has been around for 46 years. This is the 46th anniversary of people asking each other: "Is William Shatner wearing a wig or what?"

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It's embarrassing when you complement someone on a costume and they say, "It's not a costume."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: I've seen a lot of folks dressed as "The Walking Dead." Although many of them might be better described as the dead who could stand to do a bit more walking.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Comic-Con has officially banned selfie sticks and e-cigarettes, which is too bad. Because now when I see someone smoking an e-cigarette, I have nothing to beat them with.
